object.name: createInvoiceLink
object.description: Use this method to create a link for an invoice. Returns the created invoice link as String on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to create a link for an invoice. Returns the created invoice link as String on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to create a link for an invoice. Returns the created invoice link as *String* on success.

annotations.description: Product name, 1-32 characters
annotations.html_description: Product name, 1-32 characters
annotations.rst_description: Product name, 1-32 characters
annotations.name: title

annotations.description: Product description, 1-255 characters
annotations.html_description: Product description, 1-255 characters
annotations.rst_description: Product description, 1-255 characters
annotations.name: description

annotations.description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use for your internal processes.
annotations.html_description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use for your internal processes.
annotations.rst_description: Bot-defined invoice payload, 1-128 bytes. This will not be displayed to the user, use for your internal processes.
annotations.name: payload

annotations.description: Payment provider token, obtained via BotFather
annotations.html_description: Payment provider token, obtained via BotFather
annotations.rst_description: Payment provider token, obtained via `BotFather <https://t.me/botfather>`_
annotations.name: provider_token

annotations.description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see more on currencies
annotations.html_description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see more on currencies
annotations.rst_description: Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code, see `more on currencies <https://core.telegram.org/bots/payments#supported-currencies>`_
annotations.name: currency

annotations.description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.)
annotations.html_description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.)
annotations.rst_description: Price breakdown, a JSON-serialized list of components (e.g. product price, tax, discount, delivery cost, delivery tax, bonus, etc.)
annotations.name: prices

annotations.description: The maximum accepted amount for tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of US$ 1.45 pass max_tip_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0
annotations.html_description: The maximum accepted amount for tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of US$ 1.45 pass max_tip_amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0
annotations.rst_description: The maximum accepted amount for tips in the *smallest units* of the currency (integer, **not** float/double). For example, for a maximum tip of :code:`US$ 1.45` pass :code:`max_tip_amount = 145`. See the *exp* parameter in `currencies.json <https://core.telegram.org/bots/payments/currencies.json>`_, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies). Defaults to 0
annotations.name: max_tip_amount

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed max_tip_amount.
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tips in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed max_tip_amount.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized array of suggested amounts of tips in the *smallest units* of the currency (integer, **not** float/double). At most 4 suggested tip amounts can be specified. The suggested tip amounts must be positive, passed in a strictly increased order and must not exceed *max_tip_amount*.
annotations.name: suggested_tip_amounts

annotations.description: JSON-serialized data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of required fields should be provided by the payment provider.
annotations.html_description: JSON-serialized data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of required fields should be provided by the payment provider.
annotations.rst_description: JSON-serialized data about the invoice, which will be shared with the payment provider. A detailed description of required fields should be provided by the payment provider.
annotations.name: provider_data

annotations.description: URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service.
annotations.html_description: URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service.
annotations.rst_description: URL of the product photo for the invoice. Can be a photo of the goods or a marketing image for a service.
annotations.name: photo_url

annotations.description: Photo size in bytes
annotations.html_description: Photo size in bytes
annotations.rst_description: Photo size in bytes
annotations.name: photo_size

annotations.description: Photo width
annotations.html_description: Photo width
annotations.rst_description: Photo width
annotations.name: photo_width

annotations.description: Photo height
annotations.html_description: Photo height
annotations.rst_description: Photo height
annotations.name: photo_height

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's full name to complete the order
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's full name to complete the order
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's full name to complete the order
annotations.name: need_name

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's phone number to complete the order
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's phone number to complete the order
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's phone number to complete the order
annotations.name: need_phone_number

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's email address to complete the order
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's email address to complete the order
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's email address to complete the order
annotations.name: need_email

annotations.description: Pass True if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order
annotations.html_description: Pass True if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if you require the user's shipping address to complete the order
annotations.name: need_shipping_address

annotations.description: Pass True if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the user's phone number should be sent to the provider
annotations.name: send_phone_number_to_provider

annotations.description: Pass True if the user's email address should be sent to the provider

annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the user's email address should be sent to the provider

annotations.description: Pass True if the final price depends on the shipping method
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the final price depends on the shipping method
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the final price depends on the shipping method
annotations.name: is_flexible
